customCommands.name: read-workflow
customCommands.description: Read AGENTS.md for project workflow and architecture
customCommands.prompt: Read AGENTS.md completely before starting any task. This file contains the authoritative project structure, workflow, and agent instructions.

rules: Always read AGENTS.md before starting implementation work
Follow the documentation-first workflow: specs before code
Reference docs/INDEX.md to discover existing specs
Use docs/templates/ when creating new documentation artifacts
